amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt any rule relating to food safety, workplace safety, air quality, consumer product safety, or water quality from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 112-311 to exempt any rule relating to food safety, workplace safety, air quality, consumer product safety, or water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 246 (Roll no. 897).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. McCarthy (NY).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCarthy (NY) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 246 (Roll no. 897).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
